title: The Challenge of objectives
brief_description: Colour recording system: PAL;”Credits: Script by Michael Barnes in association with Ian Latimer produced and directed by Jeff Inman”;”Cast: John Alderton, Richard O’Sullivan”;”SUMMARY: Designed to help salesmen develop their ability to meet and handle objections and turn them into opportunities to close the sale”
